CustomField.description: The SObject API name of the parent object this Email agent handles (e.g. Case, Lead, MyCustomObj__c). Only meaningful when AgentType__c = Email. The EmailMessageAgentTrigger uses this field to route inbound EmailMessage records to the correct agent. Leave blank for non-Email agents.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: SObject API name this Email agent handles (e.g. Case, Lead, MyCustomObj__c). Used by the trigger to route inbound emails to this agent. Must be unique across active Email agents.
CustomField.label: Email Parent Object
